items.description: Nested subsections (indented and with dimmer title color)

examples: This device consumes 500W when active.\nStandby power: 10W
items.description: Section content. Supports rich text and \n for line breaks.
Section heading (displayed in orange, dimmer for nested levels)

properties.description: A single titled section within Operational Details. Supports nesting via children, bullet lists via items, and numbered lists via steps.

additionalProperties.description: Device-specific overrides for memory/register tooltips. Key is the memory address or name.
Device-specific overrides for version/variant tooltips. Key is the version name.
Device-specific overrides for slot tooltips. Key is the slot name.
Device-specific overrides for mode tooltips. Key is the mode name.
Device-specific overrides for logic type tooltips (e.g., Temperature, Pressure). Key is the logic type name.
Hex color for the 'Operational Details' category title

items.description: Creates a collapsible 'Operational Details' section with titled subsections. Great for advanced tips, formulas, and usage guides.
PREPENDS text to the BEGINNING of the existing description. Automatically adds spacing.
examples: \n\n<color=#FFA500>Pro Tip:</color> This device works best when...
items.description: APPENDS text to the END of the existing description. Automatically adds spacing.
examples: This is a complete replacement description.\n\nWith multiple paragraphs.
items.description: REPLACES the entire page description. Use \n for line breaks. Supports rich text tags like <color=#FF0000>red</color>.
Optional friendly name for documentation purposes (not displayed in-game)

The unique page identifier - usually the PrefabName (e.g., 'StructureArcFurnace', 'ItemKitPipe'). Find this by looking at the Prefab Name field in Stationpedia or using the spda_dumpkeys console command.

properties.description: Customizations for a specific Stationpedia page
Global descriptions that apply across all pages (logic types, slot types, modes, etc.)

items.description: Array of device-specific customizations. Each entry targets a specific Stationpedia page by its deviceKey (usually the PrefabName).

properties.description: Schema for descriptions.json - customizes tooltips and page content in Stationpedia Ascended mod

properties.description: Schema for descriptions.json - customizes tooltips and page content in Stationpedia Ascended mod

devices.description: Array of device-specific customizations. Each entry targets a specific Stationpedia page by its deviceKey (usually the PrefabName).

genericDescriptions.description: Global descriptions that apply across all pages (logic types, slot types, modes, etc.)

deviceDescriptions.description: Customizations for a specific Stationpedia page

deviceKey.description: The unique page identifier - usually the PrefabName (e.g., 'StructureArcFurnace', 'ItemKitPipe'). Find this by looking at the Prefab Name field in Stationpedia or using the spda_dumpkeys console command.

displayName.description: Optional friendly name for documentation purposes (not displayed in-game)

pageDescription.description: REPLACES the entire page description. Use \n for line breaks. Supports rich text tags like <color=#FF0000>red</color>.
examples: This is a complete replacement description.\n\nWith multiple paragraphs.

pageDescriptionAppend.description: APPENDS text to the END of the existing description. Automatically adds spacing.
examples: \n\n<color=#FFA500>Pro Tip:</color> This device works best when...

pageDescriptionPrepend.description: PREPENDS text to the BEGINNING of the existing description. Automatically adds spacing.
